resources.string: paypal-compliance
Confirm your identity
Uploading…
Checking your info
This could take a minute.
Please keep your app open.
Once your identity\'s confirmed, you can use your balance to…
Send money to friends and family
Make purchases using your balance
Keep a secret stash of fun money
To keep your money in PayPal, we need a bit more info
Confirming customer identities is one of the ways we keep your account secure. You\’ll only do this once.
We need a bit more info
We couldn\'t confirm your identity using your photo ID. To keep your money in PayPal, we\’ll need a bit more info from you.
Confirm your identity
Confirming customer identities is one of the ways we keep your account secure. You’ll only do this once.
Use your SSN instead
Use Your Driver\'s License
Place your ID on a flat surface and we\'ll take a photo for you.
We didn\'t get a photo of your ID

Place your photo ID on a flat surface and aim your device directly at it. Make sure you have good lighting or turn on the flash.\nHold your device level and steady, and tap the camera icon to take a photo manually.
Try again for an automatic photo
Take a Photo Manually
Place your ID on a flat surface and we\'ll take a photo for you.
You\'re all set
Your money is now available in your PayPal balance. You can send it, spend it, or just keep it as your secret stash of fun money.
There\'s an issue with your account
To help resolve it, please contact us.
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now
Check back in a little while.
We\'ll send you an update
Sorry about that. It\'s taking a little longer than we expected. When we\'re done reviewing your driver\'s license, we\'ll send you a notification. Look for it in the next 5 minutes.
Account Summary
Done
Next
Are you sure?
We\'ll send you an update as soon as we\'re done.
CANCEL
GO TO SUMMARY
